channel.title: Automatically closing Java-App
channel.description:
Hi, Please don't Ignore my reply
I'm having troubles using anyone's client... I can click like twice when im logged in but after clicking 2-3 times the Java App automatically closes... This is really annoying and does anyone has a solution?
[i][b][u]-Thanks in advance![/u][/b][/i] Rangasux.
[s]p.s [/s] I'm not really new to coding Rsps' but this never happened before, I installed windows 7 and this happens...

item.title: Automatically closing Java-App
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

It might be to do with your java settings, Go and check what your java settings are.

Read full topic
